lead_paragraph: Adam Peaty demolished his own world record in the heats of the  100 metres breaststroke on Saturday as he launched a bid to become the first British man to win an Olympic swimming gold medal for 28 years.

headline.print_headline: Swimming-Peaty Smashes Own 100m Breaststroke Record in Heats
headline.main: Swimming-Peaty Smashes Own 100m Breaststroke Record in Heats

snippet: Adam Peaty demolished his own world record in the heats of the  100 metres breaststroke on Saturday as he launched a bid to become the first British man to win an Olympic swimming gold medal for 28 years....
